tweet: Just since 2010, Buffalo and Western New York have seen historic preservation investment involved in more than 100 projects, totaling nearly $750 million in completed work. These investments help revitalize the region while maintaining our historic identity.

Historic Preservation Month lets us reflect on our history and how it can drive new economic activity & urban regeneration.
